Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.
Bash the target with a shield, [abilityred]knocking back[/abilityred] Light units.
Target Biological or Cyborg unit heals {HealingKitHP}[hp/] and has its non-Psionic negative Status Effects dispelled.
Target friendly Dvar unit gains [abilityblue]Motivated[/abilityblue], granting +{MotivatedMorale}[happiness/] until the end of combat.
Detonate a seismic charge that deals {SeismicDamage} to all obstacles and [abilityred]Staggers[/abilityred] all land units within 2 hexes of this unit.
This unit digs in, creating a trench around it that lasts until the end of combat and providing cover.
This unit burrows underground and bursts out on the target hex, creating a trench at the location. The burst deals damage to all adjacent units.
Melee collision attack. This will [abilityred]knock back[/abilityred] Light units.
Explosive powered melee collision attack. This will [abilityred]knock back[/abilityred] Light units.
Attempt to cause visual glitches on target Cyborg or Mechanical unit.
{StrChance} strength chance to become [abilityred]Blinded[/abilityred] for {Turns}[turn/]. If resisted, apply [abilityred]Compromised[/abilityred] instead.
This unit gains Fast Movement, {AfterburnDamage} increased Melee damage and is {AfterburnAccMod} harder to hit until the next turn.
Unit has Fast Movement, {AfterburnDamage} increased Melee damage and is {AfterburnAccMod} harder to hit.
Deal damage to all adjacent units, then enter Defense Mode.

Launch a flare, marking an area of {hexrad} hex radius. Units in that area gain [abilityred]Illuminated[/abilityred], making them {IlluminatedHit} easier to hit. The flare lasts for {flareturn}[turn/].

Target Mechanical, Cyborg or Dvar unit heals for {RapidRepairKitHealing}[hp/]. The unit also gains [abilityblue]Extra Armor[/abilityblue], granting it +{RapidRepairKitArmor}[armor/] until the end of combat.

Charge up target Mechanical or Cyborg unit, dispelling all negative status effects and giving it [abilityblue]Boosted[/abilityblue], granting it Fast Movement and increasing its damage by {BoostedDamage} for {BoostedDuration}[turn/]
This unit has Fast Movement and {BoostedDamage} increased damage.
Launch a disrupting device at the target area, dealing damage in a {hexrad} hex radius.
{DisruptStrength} strength chance to remove all Action Points from Mechanical and Cyborg targets.
Attempt to apply [abilityred]Blinded[/abilityred] to all adjacent units. Then regain all [movewalk/] but the unit can only move or activate a [abilityblue]Defense Mode[/abilityblue].
Pull the target next to this unit.
At the end of the turn, any adjacent enemy units take {Grinder} damage and have a strength {GrinderChance} chance to be [abilityred]Immobilized[/abilityred] for {duration}.
Crush a target. If the target is a Light unit, there is a {Crush&ProcessInstaKill} strength chance that it will instantly die.
Fire a non-damaging supressive round at target Biological or Cyborg unit.

This unit's trenches become Fortified Trenches instead, ensuring that they can only be destroyed by abilities with [abilityred]Demolisher[/abilityred]. These fortifications also heal Dvar units inside of them for {FortificationHeal}[hp/] per [turn/].
Unit gains [abilityblue]Detection[/abilityblue], gets +{SensorBonus} Sensor Range and ignores {AdvancedLOSIgnore}% of the accuracy penalties from line of sight while in combat.
Ignores {AdvancedLOSIgnore}% of line of sight penalties
This unit gains one level of [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue] and {ERAResistance}[defensephysical/] resistance against Explosive attacks.
Reconstruct a destroyed friendly Mechanical unit to {ReconstructionHP} of its maximum [hp/], or heal a working one for {HealEffect}[hp/].[br/][br/]Cannot reconstruct tier 4 units.

Melee attacks gain one level of [abilityred]Stagger Impact[/abilityred] and have a {SuperPoweredPistonsConcuss} strength chance to apply [abilityred]Concussion[/abilityred] to non-Ethereal or non-Mechanical units, for {DurationConcuss}[turn/].
Units adjacent to this one gain +{CaptainsRegaliaHaloMorale} and have {CaptainsRegaliaHaloResist} to all resistances.[br/]Does not affect Mindless units.
This unit is inspired by an adjacent unit, gaining {CaptainsRegaliaHaloMorale} and {CaptainsRegaliaHaloResist} in all resistances.
This unit deals {IlluminatorDamageBonus}% damage against [abilityred]Illuminated[/abilityred] targets.

Unit gains a level of [abilityblue]Stagger Resistance[/abilityblue], and each time it takes damage, it gains a charge of [abilityblue]Kinetic Energy[/abilityblue], up to a maximum of {KineticEnergyMax}.
Increases the damage of Unleash Stored Energy by {Damage} per stack.
Deal damage in a {hexdis} hex cone, increased by {ReactiveKineticEnergyBatteryIncrease}% for each stack of [abilityblue]Kinetic Energy[/abilityblue] the unit has.

Prospect a sector, gaining a small amount of resources. The unit has to remain stationary on the center of the sector for {ProspectDuraction}[turn/] during this process.[br/]Each sector can only be prospected once.
Your Prospector has prospected {STR_structureName} and has found:
required this line with the icon, copied the localized text from string PROSPECT_SECTOR@ABILITY_NAME and added the icon.

Lock in place at the center of a sector for {EarthCrackDuration}. You then crack the sector, granting you valuable resources but turning the sector into Barren Volcanic.[br/]Doesn't work on Large Mountain Sectors.
Cracking the earth of {STR_structureName}. When completed this sector will become Barren Volcanic.
Your Earth Crusher has cracked the sector of {STR_structureName} and has delivered its bounty:
Provides cover for units inside, grants {accuracyBonus} accuracy and heals them for {FortificationHeal}[hp/] per [turn/].
Provides cover for units inside and grants them {accuracyBonus} accuracy.
Units in this area are {IlluminatedHit} easier to hit.
A melee attack with a metal fist.
Give this unit [abilityblue]Steady Weapon[/abilityblue]. The unit gains {accinc} accuracy and {InccreasedRange} range on Missile Barrage until it moves.
Missile Barrage is an ability in the explosives group (Upgrades_Explosives_UnitProperties.xml)
Unit has +{ranginc} inreased range and +{accinc} accuracy on Missile Barrage until it moves.
Missile Barrage is an ability in the explosives group (Upgrades_Explosives_UnitProperties.xml)
